example_en: I bought a new camera for my trip.
Can you take a photo of us?
Turn off the flash, it's too bright.
This lens is great for portraits.
The photo is out of focus.
Zoom in to see the details.
Which filter did you use on this photo?
I need to edit this photo before posting.
Georgia has beautiful landscapes to photograph.
Use a tripod for night photography.
A fast shutter speed freezes motion.
The exposure is too bright, lower it.
Crop the photo to remove the background.
Try shooting from a low angle.
Good lighting makes all the difference.
Let's go shoot some photos downtown.
Check my photo gallery on Instagram.
Add a watermark to protect your photos.
Find a clean background for the photo.
I took a quick snapshot of the sunset.
Put the photo in a frame.
The image has millions of pixels.
Increase the ISO in low light.
Take a panorama of the mountains.
The fisheye lens distorts the image.
Set the timer for ten seconds.
Use burst mode for action shots.
Put the camera in the bag.
We need some props for the shoot.
Capture the reflection in the water.
The photo is in black and white.
Apply a mask to the layer.
My photos are in an exhibition.
Buy the license for the image.
I work as a freelance photographer.
The photo session lasted two hours.
Develop the film in the darkroom.
The darkroom is essential for film.
The timestamp shows when it was taken.
